content.json:
# TrashMob Feature Usage Metrics

This workbook provides insights into feature adoption and user engagement across the TrashMob web application.

---

## Overview

Key metrics at a glance for the selected time period.

content.query:
customEvents
| where timestamp {TimeRange}
| where name startswith "Auth_" or name startswith "Event_" or name startswith "Attendance_" or name startswith "LitterReport_"
| summarize 
    TotalEvents = count(),
    Logins = countif(name == "Auth_Login_Success"),
    EventsCreated = countif(name == "Event_Create_Submit"),
    Registrations = countif(name == "Attendance_Register_Submit"),
    LitterReports = countif(name == "LitterReport_Create_Submit")
| project TotalEvents, Logins, EventsCreated, Registrations, LitterReports
content.title: Feature Usage Summary

content.query:
customEvents
| where timestamp {TimeRange}
| where name startswith "Auth_" or name startswith "Event_" or name startswith "Attendance_" or name startswith "LitterReport_"
| summarize Count = count() by bin(timestamp, 1d), Category = case(
    name startswith "Auth_", "Authentication",
    name startswith "Event_", "Events",
    name startswith "Attendance_", "Attendance",
    name startswith "LitterReport_", "Litter Reports",
    "Other")
| order by timestamp asc
content.title: Feature Usage Over Time

content.json:
---
## Authentication Metrics

Login and logout activity tracking.

content.query:
customEvents
| where timestamp {TimeRange}
| where name in ("Auth_Login_Success", "Auth_Logout_Success")
| summarize Count = count() by bin(timestamp, 1h), Action = case(
    name == "Auth_Login_Success", "Login",
    name == "Auth_Logout_Success", "Logout",
    "Other")
| order by timestamp asc
content.title: Login/Logout Activity

content.query:
customEvents
| where timestamp {TimeRange}
| where name in ("Auth_Login_Success", "Auth_Logout_Success")
| summarize Count = count() by name
| project Action = case(
    name == "Auth_Login_Success", "Logins",
    name == "Auth_Logout_Success", "Logouts",
    name), Count
content.title: Authentication Summary

content.json:
---
## Event Creation Metrics

Cleanup event creation tracking.

content.query:
customEvents
| where timestamp {TimeRange}
| where name == "Event_Create_Submit"
| summarize EventsCreated = count() by bin(timestamp, 1d)
| order by timestamp asc
content.title: Events Created Per Day

content.query:
customEvents
| where timestamp {TimeRange}
| where name == "Event_Create_Submit"
| extend EventTypeId = tostring(customDimensions.eventTypeId)
| summarize Count = count() by EventTypeId
| order by Count desc
content.title: Events by Type

content.query:
customEvents
| where timestamp {TimeRange}
| where name == "Event_Create_Submit"
| extend FromLitterReport = tobool(customDimensions.fromLitterReport)
| summarize Count = count() by Source = iif(FromLitterReport == true, "From Litter Report", "Direct Creation")
| order by Count desc
content.title: Event Creation Source

content.query:
customEvents
| where timestamp {TimeRange}
| where name == "Attendance_Register_Submit"
| summarize Registrations = count() by bin(timestamp, 1d)
| order by timestamp asc
content.title: Event Registrations Per Day

content.query:
customEvents
| where timestamp {TimeRange}
| where name == "Attendance_Register_Submit"
| extend EventId = tostring(customDimensions.eventId)
| summarize Registrations = count() by EventId
| top 10 by Registrations desc
content.title: Top 10 Events by Registrations

content.json:
---
## Litter Report Metrics

Litter report submission tracking.

content.query:
customEvents
| where timestamp {TimeRange}
| where name == "LitterReport_Create_Submit"
| summarize Reports = count() by bin(timestamp, 1d)
| order by timestamp asc
content.title: Litter Reports Per Day

content.query:
customEvents
| where timestamp {TimeRange}
| where name == "LitterReport_Create_Submit"
| extend ImageCount = toint(customDimensions.imageCount)
| summarize AvgImages = avg(ImageCount), MaxImages = max(ImageCount), TotalReports = count()
content.title: Litter Report Statistics

content.json:
---
## User Journey Funnel

Tracking user progression through key milestones.

content.title: User Journey Funnel

content.json:
---
## Key Performance Indicators (KPIs)

| KPI | Target | Description |
|-----|--------|-------------|
| **Daily Active Users** | Growing | Users who log in at least once per day |
| **Events Created/Week** | 10+ | New cleanup events created weekly |
| **Registration Rate** | 50%+ | Users who view events and register |
| **Litter Reports/Week** | 20+ | New litter reports submitted weekly |
| **Event Completion Rate** | 80%+ | Events that result in completed summaries |

---

*Last updated: Workbook auto-refreshes based on time range selection*
